team6.finalproject

Class CountdownTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • team6.finalproject.PausableTimerListener
      • team6.finalproject.CountdownTimer

  • public class CountdownTimer
extends PausableTimerListener
    CountdownTimer Class

    Class that acts as a timer throughout the allowed operational timeframe of the robot. Signals when it is time to begin heading back to the starting point to avoid disqualification

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kael Du
